document.full_text: monday morning skate: home ice hasn't meant much in the n.h.l. playoffs so far; vancouver sits goalie roberto luongo but has to rely on him anyway and falls to a game 7 with chicago; predators finally break through.
document.title: monday morning skate: road-ice advantage, goalie go-rounds and plus/minus
lines_and_colors: monday morning skate: home ice hasn't meant much in the n.h.l. playoffs so far; vancouver sits goalie roberto luongo but has to rely on him anyway and falls to a game 7 with chicago; predators finally break through.
